gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: ATL04 contains along-track atmosphere backscatter data at full instrument resolution. The product includes full 532 nm (14 km) uncalibrated attenuated backscatter profiles at 25 times per second for vertical bins of approximately 30 meters. Includes calibration coefficient values derived from data within the polar regions.
